description: This file is a header (.h) defining a C++ class 'pam' that serves as an interface stub for PAM-related functionality. It declares class members, including constructor, initialize/cleanup methods, and several JSON-RPC method bindings and handlers for PAM operations in a network testing environment.

classes.name: pam
classes.description: A class implementing a JSON-RPC server interface for PAM functionalities, used in network testing scenarios.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the PAM interface, possibly establishing connections or resources.

methods.name: cleanup
methods.description: Cleans up resources allocated by the PAM interface.

methods.name: testmodulepre_requisites
methods.description: Checks or sets up pre-requisites before running tests.

methods.name: testmodulepost_requisites
methods.description: Validates post-conditions after test execution.

methods.name: pam_bridge_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Handler for retrieving a parameter value as an unsigned long.

methods.name: pam_GetParameterNames
methods.description: Handler for fetching parameter names.

methods.name: pam_SetParameterValues
methods.description: Handler for setting parameter values.

methods.name: pam_Setparams
methods.description: Handler for setting multiple parameters.

methods.name: pam_GetParameterValues
methods.description: Handler for retrieving parameter values.

methods.name: pam_MTAAgentRestart
methods.description: Handler to restart the MTA agent.

methods.name: pam_CRRestart
methods.description: Handler to restart CR.

methods.name: pam_Init
methods.description: Initialization handler.

methods.name: COSAPAM_DmlMlanGetParamValue
methods.description: Handler for getting MLAN specific parameter value.

methods.name: COSAPAM_DmlEthGetParamValue
methods.description: Handler for getting Ethernet specific parameter value.

methods.name: COSAPAM_DmlDiGetParamValue
methods.description: Handler for getting Di-specific parameter value.

methods.name: COSAPAM_UpnpEnable
methods.description: Handler to enable or disable UPnP.

methods.name: COSAPAM_UpnpGetState
methods.description: Handler to get UPnP state.

methods.name: COSAPAM_DhcpGet
methods.description: Handler to get DHCP information.

methods.name: COSAPAM_DhcpsEnable
methods.description: Handler to enable or disable DHCP server.

methods.name: COSAPAM_DnsGet
methods.description: Handler to get DNS configuration.

methods.name: COSAPAM_DnsEnable
methods.description: Handler to enable or disable DNS.

methods.name: pam(TcpSocketServer & ptrRpcServer)
methods.description: unavailable
